Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T>, typename idx = unsigned int>
class kche_tree::IndirectHeap< T, Compare, idx >

Define a reference-based heap over an array of existing data that can be accessed and modified while mantaining the heap properties.

Element indices can be pushed up to a maximum size.

Template Parameters:
TType of the data stored in the k-vector.
CompareType of the comparison object. Defaults to std::less<T>.
idxType used for encoding data vector indices. Defaults to unsigned int, but can be reduced to short or char for small K values.
